alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 5:28PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Dale and southeastern Coffee Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 527 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fort Rucker, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Level Plains, Clayhatchee, Knox Field, Gerald, Lowe Army Heliport, Central City, Battens Crossroads, Shell Army Field, Cairns Aaf, Camp Alaflo Bsa, Keyton, Coppinville and Cool Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
